name: Bzz Bzz vacuum
description:
¿What is worse than a mosquito in your room at night? ¡Hundreds of them!

Get rid of waves of bloodthirsty mosquitoes while upgrading your vacuum cleaner and getting stronger with cool power-ups.

So go and get your vacuum cleaner and give those mosquitoes a lesson.

Credits

A game by okamu studios

https://www.facebook.com/OkamuStudios

Design: Sebastian Sánchez Lara

Production: Oscar G Migoni
